name: ValueMax 6-Piece Magnetic Screwdriver Set, 3 Phillips and 3 Flat Tip Screwdrivers, Non-slip Handle Screw Driver Set Kit
short_description: Versatile Screwdriver Sets: This precision screwdriver set contains the most commonly used 3 slotted screwdrivers (1/8"*3", 3/16"*3", 1/4"*4") and 3 phillips screwdrivers (PH0*3", PH1*3", PH2*4"). It's designed to effortlessly handle a variety of tasks, from assembling furniture to repairing electronics. Whether you're a professional or an amateur enthusiast, this set will enhance efficiency and precision in your projects.

Strong Magnetic Tips & Quick Pick Model Mark: The screwdrivers in this set feature strong magnetic tips that securely grip screws and keep magnetization for a long time. The blackening treatment can effectively prevent rust and reduce cam-out. Additionally, each screw driver is clearly marked for easy identification, allowing you to quickly select the right tool and save time during tasks.

Superior Materials & Environmentally Friendly: Crafted from CR-V steel with heat treatment and polished anti-rust surface, the magnetic screw driver set kit provides reliable performance over the long term. The materials used meet stringent eco-friendly standards with a total content of three o-phenols less than 1000 ppm, ensuring safety for both users and the environment.

Enhanced Grip Strength & Comfortable Control: The overall design of the screwdriver kit is ergonomic, offering enhanced grip strength and comfortable handling. The soft, impact-resistant handles reduce fatigue and provide optimal torque, even during prolonged use. The handle slot accepts other screwdrivers for added leverage.

Practical Gift in Important Days: The magnetic tip screwdriver set is not only a practical addition to any household toolkit but also an excellent gift choice for men and DIY enthusiasts. Whether for tackling everyday repairs or undertaking ambitious projects, it's a thoughtful and versatile gift that combines utility with quality craftsmanship. Perfect for birthdays, holidays, or other occasion.

Great Support : World 2nd hand tool business for quality security and lifetime support. If you have any questions about the product, please contact us. We will reply to you as soon as possible within 24 hours. Thank you for your support
